english: Many plants have begun to automate .
chinese: 许多工厂已开始实行自动化生产。

english: It is simple conceptually and easy to automate .
chinese: 它概念简单并且容易自动化。

english: It is not entirely suited to automatic computation .
chinese: 它不完全适合自动化计算。

english: One story about automation goes as follows .
chinese: 有一个关于自动化的故事是这么说的。

english: Attitudes to automation vary across a wide spectrum .
chinese: 人们对自动化的态度各不相同。
自动化造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Automation has obsoleted many unskilled workers .
chinese: 自动化使很多非技术工人受到淘汰。
干燥机可以自动化作业。

english: The production of this bibliography is totally automated .
chinese: 这个目录的编制过程全是自动化的。

english: All other services will have automated room delivery systems .
chinese: 所有其他的服务都要使用房间自动化运送系统。

english: Many important areas of decision can be reduced to automatic rules .
chinese: 许多重要的决策领域能够应用自动化的规则。

english: The coming of automation is bound to have important social consequences .
chinese: 自动化的实现必然会产生重大的社会影响。

english: The laboratory automation techniques have their greatest use in the clinical laboratory .
chinese: 实验室自动化技术在现场实验室中得到最广泛的应用。

english: These two visions imply such enormous increases in productivity as a corollary to automation .
chinese: 这两种观点都把劳动生产率的巨大提高看成是自动化的必然结果。

english: He extends his nervous system and his thinking and decision-making faculties through automation .
chinese: 人类通过自动化扩展了人类神经系统的功能思维和决断的才能。

english: The process can be carried out on a manual basis or in an automated auto analyzer system .
chinese: 测定过程可以是手工操作，也可以采用自动化的自动分析器系统来完成。
